meanings.sent1: Her inimitablenesses in creativity set her apart from the rest of the artists.
meanings.sent2: The inimitablenesses of his style made him a legendary figure in the fashion industry.
meanings.sent3: The inimitablenesses of her baking skills were the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: His inimitablenesses in problem-solving were like a superpower in the office.
meanings.sent5: The inimitablenesses of the sunset painted a breathtaking scene in the sky.

meanings.definition: The state of being unable to be imitated.
meanings.sent1: The inimitablenesses of her dance moves left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent2: His inimitablenesses in mimicry made him a hit at parties.
meanings.sent3: The inimitablenesses of his excuses for being late were always entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her inimitablenesses in acting were like watching magic on stage.
meanings.sent5: The inimitablenesses of the mountain's peak were a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being unique and unmatched.
meanings.sent1: The inimitablenesses of her voice captivated audiences worldwide.
meanings.sent2: His inimitablenesses in leadership inspired his team to great success.
meanings.sent3: The inimitablenesses of his fashion sense always turned heads.
meanings.sent4: Her inimitablenesses in storytelling made her books bestsellers.
meanings.sent5: The inimitablenesses of the ancient ruins left visitors speechless.
